summary: Tommy is sent to live with his father who takes him to live in an abandoned council estate. Tommy begins to hear strange noises from other flats. Essentially abandoned by his father, he and his new friend Carmen must try to solve the mystery using only their makeshift lanterns.
cast: Clem Tibber|Shaun Dingwall|Elarica Johnson|Lee Arnold|Sam Ashurst|Isaura Barb√©-Brown|James Capel|James Doherty|Oliver Gilbert|Luke Kidd|Carys Lewis|Lyndsey Marshal|Jennifer Matter|Katherine Mount|Conor Short|Morgan Thomas
keywords: father|son|mother|daughter|learning the identity of one's father
title: The Forgotten
